reviews.review: Not as good.but it is good

《半衰期2：第一章》9/10

作为对本体结局的扩展剧情，关卡数量没有本体充足，一共只有五关，但玩过本体的玩家不用说，应该都会去玩第一章与第二章，因为质量原汁原味的优秀，忠于原著。和本体一样，本作是线性流程解谜+第一人称射击游戏，并且也是全程中文配音。故事方面有二代打下的地基，同样令人满意，结局也与本体一样惊艳，吊足了胃口。解谜保持优质的水准，但稍微比本体要简单一些。逃命与射杀还是那味，感觉比起二代“射杀时刻”的BGM，多了一些电子乐，仍然紧张刺激。

关卡解谜设计：★★★★★ / 故事性：★★★★★ / 场景搭建氛围感：★★★★★ / 射击手感：★★★★☆ / 视听质量：★★☆☆☆
just like half life but x2
Corta pero buena por si terminaste el primer  half life 2 empieza  cuando termina  el otro

An interactive Cutscene galore with an annoying character "Oh gawd Ghordon, we gotta keep movin' Goredon..." the game's a lot shorter than the other HL2 games, it had a few cool moments and the game can get pretty decent when you're left alone to experience it for yourself. But that can only take a lacklustre episode so far.
2편의 재미를 제대로 보여주지 못한 작품. 잘 만든 게임이긴 하나, 스토리도 진부한 느낌이 나고 플레이 타임이 고작 2시간 밖에 되지 않는다.  스토리 이해를 위해 플레이 하는것을 추천.

all the gritty, panic-inducing, claustrophobic parts of HL2 made into a feature length game

HL2的第一部续作，讲述了HL2结局[spoiler]暗能城堡奇点爆炸一瞬间弗里曼被Gman冻结[/spoiler]之后的故事。Alyx在爆炸下生死未卜？17号城处于重大危机？戈登弗里曼怎样再次出山？本作都将告诉你答案。

本作有一个成就：一弹逃出术，要求你在流程中只用一颗子弹就完成整个游戏，那么玩过HL2的你一定不难想到，这一作依旧非常鼓励使用重力枪来应对大多数情况（[spoiler]火箭筒和手榴弹不算子弹，流程中有使用火箭筒的必要性[/spoiler]），推荐玩家在熟悉流程后或者低难度下一定用重力枪玩一遍整个流程。
ЕСЛИ ВЫ ХОТИТЕ ДОСТИЖЕНИЕ ОДИНОКАЯ ПУЛЯ ТО ПРОХОДИТЕ НА ЛЕГКОМ ЛИБО НА ТРУДНОМ БЫЛ ПИЗДЕЦ И НЕ ВСЕГДА СМОЖЕТЕ ПРОЙТИ

If you want to play through the series then you need to play this one.  It's also good to have for mods so just buy it, you can get it dirt cheap during a sale.

Episode 1 is probably the black sheep of the mainline Half-Life games not because it's bad (it isn't bad at all), but because it doesn't do a whole lot either.  Whereas Episode 2 was more of Half-Life 2 and did a lot more things with it, Episode 1 is basically just more Half-Life 2 in terms of gameplay and not much else.  Episode 2 built upon Half-Life 2, Episode 1 is more of the same.  There's a new zombie variant, some story, and that's pretty much it.  Most of Episode 1 is you and Alyx traversing through City 17 while fighting enemies along the way.  At most Episode 1 exists to keep pedaling the story along from Half-Life 2 to Episode 2, Episode 1 really serves to bridge the gap in between.  It's not outstanding by any means although it's still a good game, and it's a requirement when playing through Gordon Freeman's adventures.  Yeah, do get this game, just don't expect it to be as spectacular or different like Episode 2.
This game very much reminds me of the times I had before the accident.

pues que decir todos los half life son buenisimos el primer contacto que tuvo fue en el orange box y sinceramente no le di la oportunidad que se merece se me hacia muy tedioso que equivocado estaba, te atrapa desde el primer juego y quieres continuar con la saga incluso las expansiones recomiendo que compre el pack de valve para que asi tengan todo

Aunque es considerado como un juego aparte, yo lo consideraría mas como una expansión del Half-life 2 (como fueron opposition force y blue shift con Half-life 1) esto debido a su poca duración, aun así es una muy buena entrega para la continuación de la saga y que va al grano con el objetivo, en este caso su antecesor Half-life 2 que era de destruir el portal de ciudad 17, ahora nuestro objetivo será evacuar a los ciudadanos y escapar de ciudad 17 por fin, no obstante desenvolvernos en unos combates con diferentes enemigos que algunos darán dolor de cabeza (como los mendigos zancudos), muy buena continuación y titulo.
